rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
描绘 IBD 治疗的未来：从免疫调节剂到 microRNA 疗法在《eGastroenterology》杂志最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员深入研究了治疗炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的最新治疗策略，包括溃疡性结肠炎和克罗恩病。该论文讨论了从免疫调节药物和生物制剂到 microRNA 上调剂和干细胞疗法等新方法的新兴治疗方法，强调了 IBD 护理中对精准医疗的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Charting-the-future-of-IBD-treatment-From-immune-modulators-to-microRNA-therapie.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Charting-the-future-of-IBD-treatment-From-immune-modulators-to-microRNA-therapie.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20622dcb-d40b-4b09-abbb-7affe8ed5e26 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Charting the future of IBD treatment: From immune modulators to microRNA therapie
疾病预防控制中心报告称，美国先天性梅毒病例的增加与检测和治疗失败有关《发病率和死亡率每周报告》中的一项分析强调，由于检测和治疗方面的差距，美国先天性梅毒病例激增，强调需要加强产前护理策略，以有效对抗这种可预防的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Rise-in-US-congenital-syphilis-cases-linked-to-testing-and-treatment-failures-CDC-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Rise-in-US-congenital-syphilis-cases-linked-to-testing-and-treatment-failures-CDC-reports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d3249e6-7460-4bb4-8e22-9fe36bbe91a2 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:50:00 -0500 Rise in US congenital syphilis cases linked to testing and treatment failures, CDC reports
一项强有力的审查为美国卫生政策提供了信息，氟化物和密封剂战胜了青少年龋齿在 JAMA 网络的全面审查中，研究人员发现氟化物治疗和密封剂等预防性口腔健康干预措施可有效对抗青少年龋齿，为美国预防服务工作组和医疗保健提供者提供了可行的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Fluoride-and-sealants-win-against-youth-dental-caries-a-robust-review-informs-US-health-policy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Fluoride-and-sealants-win-against-youth-dental-caries-a-robust-review-informs-US-health-policy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=572571bd-c09c-4c7a-8eaa-5e411a14513d Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:36:00 -0500 Fluoride and sealants win against youth dental caries, a robust review informs US health policy
大麻及其衍生物有望减轻体重和腰围，并对身体脂肪产生微妙的影响《国际肥胖杂志》上的研究报告称，大麻及其衍生物可能会影响体重和腰围，对身体脂肪产生不同的影响，这表明大麻及其衍生物有可能作为肥胖管理的治疗辅助手段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-and-derivatives-show-promise-in-reducing-weight-and-waist-circumference-with-nuanced-effects-on-body-fat。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-and-derivatives-show-promise-in-reducing-weight-and-waist-circumference-with-nuanced-effects-on-body-fat。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3dbc961-cb43-4e35-a71f-61d5dd90769f Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Cannabis and derivatives show promise in reducing weight and waist circumference, with nuanced effects on body fat
大麻的使用改变了 DNA 甲基化，其影响超出了吸烟的影响分子精神病学中的一项大规模荟萃分析表明，终生吸食大麻与外周血 DNA 甲基化变化有关，这可能对了解吸食大麻对健康的长期影响具有重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-use-alters-DNA-methylation-with-implications-beyond-smoking-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-use-alters-DNA-methylation-with-implications-beyond-smoking-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c743aba-48ad-414a-9d77-c661901b5694 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 21:31:00 -0500 Cannabis use alters DNA methylation, with implications beyond smoking effects
全球研究重点关注电子烟使用者的电子烟呼吸风险VERITAS 研究是一项全球横断面调查，旨在通过专门关注吸电子烟但从未吸烟的个体来隔离电子烟对呼吸系统健康的影响，为使用电子烟的直接后果提供独特的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c334319-b8de-4293-98d3-2623c5ca702a Wed, 08 Nov 2023 18:17:00 -0500 Global study zeroes in on vaping's respiratory risks among exclusive e-cigarette users
停止激素避孕药后几周内，节育引起的凝血风险恢复正常众所周知，使用避孕药和其他基于激素的避孕药会使血栓的风险增加约三倍，但一项新的研究表明，这种风险在停止使用这些避孕药后两到四个星期内基本上消失今天发表在《血液》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Clotting-risk-from-birth-control-normalizes-within-weeks-of-stopping-hormonal-contraceptives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Clotting-risk-from-birth-control-normalizes-within-weeks-of-stopping-hormonal-contraceptives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd148cb-8f65-4479-9b27-31e270496691 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:51:00 -0500 Clotting risk from birth control normalizes within weeks of stopping hormonal contraceptives
糖尿病突破：科学家发现刺激β细胞生长的新途径威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员发现了一种在糖尿病临床前模型中刺激健康的产生胰岛素的胰腺β细胞生长的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diabetes-breakthrough-Scientists-uncover-novel-route-to-stimulate-beta-cell-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diabetes-breakthrough-Scientists-uncover-novel-route-to-stimulate-beta-cell-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d9385d4-49cc-46fd-ad09-dfcb5bfe5e12 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:45:00 -0500 Diabetes breakthrough: Scientists uncover novel route to stimulate beta cell growth
经常喝含咖啡因苏打水的幼儿可能面临更高的饮酒风险新研究表明，年幼儿童经常饮用含咖啡因苏打水的趋势可能表明未来饮酒的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Young-children-frequently-drinking-caffelated-soda-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Young-children-frequently-drinking-caffelated-soda-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f588ea7e-df90-4cb9-b3a8-82aeed72c3d7 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:38:00 -0500 Young children frequently drinking caffeinated soda may be at higher risk of alcohol consumption
附近健康组织中的基因表达可能是肺癌复发的更好预测因子纽约大学朗格健康中心及其珀尔穆特癌症中心领导的一项新研究表明，从肺部肿瘤附近看似健康的组织中收集的遗传信息可能比对肿瘤本身的分析更能预测治疗后癌症是否会复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Gene-express-in-nearby-healthy-tissue-may-be-a-better-predictor-of-lung-cancer-recurrence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Gene-express-in-nearby-healthy-tissue-may-be-a-better-predictor-of-lung-cancer-recurrence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f9ab765-79fc-4649-b284-4af0c2f2dbb1 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 14:33:00 -0500 Gene expression in nearby healthy tissue may be a better predictor of lung cancer recurrence
